captions.text:
Sunny, if you saw me today, you'll
scream "I love you" a thousand times.
By god, I am looking Red hot.
I will never do anything wrong.
The guy who conned you... me too.

A man name Iqbal Khan
conned me of ten lakh rupees.

So I was right. The entire
drama was to attract me.

You are so attractive.
I couldn't help myself.

I want to start a chain
of restaurants in India.

I can help you set
up your restaurant.

I am conning him
and he is conning me
You're a quiet a classy thief
